org.webrtc

Class EglBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.webrtc.EglBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EglBase10, EglBase14

    public abstract class EglBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds EGL state and utility methods for handling an egl 1.0 EGLContext, an EGLDisplay, and an EGLSurface.
